detail_desc: Chino shorts in stretch cotton twill. Regular, elasticated waist with a concealed drawstring, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and jetted back pockets.

Single-breasted jacket in sturdy jersey with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and a fastening with two buttons at the front. Chest pocket, patch front pockets, an inner pocket and a single back vent. Tape-trimmed inner seams. Unlined. Slim Fit – a fit that shapes in at the chest and tapers at the waist. This, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Set with a double-layered hat and tube scarf in soft jersey with a shimmering metallic pattern.
Set with a double-layered hat and tube scarf in soft jersey with a shimmering metallic pattern.
Blouse in an airy viscose weave with a flounce-trimmed, embroidered yoke at the front, opening with a button at the back of the neck, and long puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Top in a patterned viscose weave with an elasticated square neckline with a small frill trim. Long sleeves with smocked cuffs, a smocked seam at the waist and peplum.
Boxy-style top in cotton sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves with decorative seams, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Oversized top in sturdy cotton jersey with a print motif on the chest and back, a ribbed neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Short skirt in a softly draping weave with a high waist and detachable tie belt. Concealed zip at the back, side pockets and pleats at the top to create soft draping. Unlined.
Short skirt in a softly draping weave with a high waist and detachable tie belt. Concealed zip at the back, side pockets and pleats at the top to create soft draping. Unlined.
Top in jersey with broderie anglaise. Short puff sleeves with elasticated flounced trims, and a flounce at the hem.
Leggings in very sturdy jersey with concealed elastication at the waist, sewn-in creases and a concealed zip at the hems.

Pyjamas in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Top with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Bottoms with elasticated ribbing and a concealed drawstring at the waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.

Blouse in an airy linen and viscose weave with a slightly wider neckline and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Gathered seam under the bust and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication. Unlined.
Calf-length culottes in jersey crêpe. High waist with covered elastication and a small frill trim, pockets in the side seams and wide, straight legs.
Calf-length skirt in a crêpe weave. High waist with covered elastication at the back and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Calf-length skirt in a crêpe weave. High waist with covered elastication at the back and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Ankle-length culottes in woven fabric. High, frill-trimmed paper bag waist with covered elastication and a detachable belt with a plastic buckle. Side pockets and wide straight legs.
Short skirt in stretch cotton twill with a high waist, visible button fly and patch front pockets. Unlined.
Calf-length skirt in patterned mesh with a high waist, grosgrain waistband and concealed zip at the back. Jersey lining.
Trousers in superstretch twill. High waist with concealed elastication and slim legs with narrow hems.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in an airy linen and viscose weave with a collar, V-neck and buttons at the top. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a decorative tab and button, and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets, side pockets and jetted back pockets. Elasticated seam at the waist with a sewn-on tie belt at the front, belt loops with a decorative button, and gently tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey. Smocked bodice, with an overlocked frill trim at the top, long sleeves and a flared skirt. Unlined.

Short dress in softly draping satin with a deep neckline, pearly buttons down the front and short puff sleeves with pleats and cuffs. Seam under the bust, elastication at the back of the waist and a softly draping skirt. Unlined.
Short dress in organic cotton jersey with a sweetheart neckline and decorative bow at the front. Long puff sleeves with smocking and a small frill trim, and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Calf-length dress in a softly draping, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and diagonal buttons down the front. Short, smocked, frill-trimmed sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Sunglasses with metal frames, sidepieces decorated with pearly plastic beads and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Shorts in sturdy cotton denim. High, frill-trimmed waist with wide elastication and detachable tie belt, and pockets in the side seams.
Gently fitted, single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with peak lapels and a single button at the front. Welt front pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Gently fitted, single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with peak lapels and a single button at the front. Welt front pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Gently fitted, single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with peak lapels and a single button at the front. Welt front pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Gently fitted, single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with peak lapels and a single button at the front. Welt front pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.

Ankle-length suit trousers in woven fabric. Extended waistband with a concealed button, zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening, diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

Single-breasted jacket in a slightly stretchy weave. Notch lapels with a decorative buttonhole, a chest pocket, patch front pockets and one inner pocket. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a double back vent. Lined. Slim Fit – a fit that shapes in at the chest and tapers at the waist. This, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.

Ankle-length jeans in cotton denim with a paper bag waist that has a concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the front and covered elastication at the back. Pleats at the front, a zip fly and a contrasting colour belt in a double layer of twill with metal D-rings. Back pockets, diagonal side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Shorts in soft, printed cotton jersey with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and side pockets.
Shorts in soft, printed cotton jersey with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and side pockets.
Shorts in soft, printed cotton jersey with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and side pockets.
Shorts in soft, printed cotton jersey with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and side pockets.
Shorts in soft, printed cotton jersey with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and side pockets.
Cargo shorts in rustly nylon with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and flap back and leg pockets with concealed press-studs.
Cargo shorts in rustly nylon with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and flap back and leg pockets with concealed press-studs.
Shorts in woven fabric with contrasting colour grosgrain side stripes. Elasticated, drawstring waist, a fake fly, zipped side pockets and an open back pocket.
Shorts in woven fabric with contrasting colour grosgrain side stripes. Elasticated, drawstring waist, a fake fly, zipped side pockets and an open back pocket.
Knee-length shorts in a patterned cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly, diagonal side pockets and a welt back pocket.
Sleeveless playsuit in lace with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Seam at the waist with pleats, a concealed zip in one side, and wide legs. Jersey lining.
Sleeveless playsuit in lace with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Seam at the waist with pleats, a concealed zip in one side, and wide legs. Jersey lining.
Sleeveless playsuit in lace with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Seam at the waist with pleats, a concealed zip in one side, and wide legs. Jersey lining.

Ankle-length trousers in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, flap leg pockets with buttons and fake welt back pockets. Tapered legs with elasticated smocking at the hems.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in woven fabric with a V-neck, concealed zip at the back and short sleeves. Relaxed fit with a seam and detachable tie belt at the waist, patch front pockets and straight, wide legs. Unlined.
Joggers in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with a regular, elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a fake back pocket. Tapered legs with elasticated hems.

Oversized shirt jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button and side pockets. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Oversized shirt jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button and side pockets. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and wide, straight legs.
High-waisted, ankle-length, circular skirt in woven fabric. Wide, draped waistband with a wrapover front, and a concealed zip at the back. Unlined.
High-waisted, ankle-length, circular skirt in woven fabric. Wide, draped waistband with a wrapover front, and a concealed zip at the back. Unlined.
High-waisted, ankle-length, circular skirt in woven fabric. Wide, draped waistband with a wrapover front, and a concealed zip at the back. Unlined.
High-waisted, ankle-length, circular skirt in woven fabric. Wide, draped waistband with a wrapover front, and a concealed zip at the back. Unlined.

Ankle-length trousers in sturdy cotton twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, patch front pockets and back pockets. Tapered legs, leg pockets with a concealed zip, and a zip at the front of the hems.
Short skirt in a patterned weave with a slight sheen. Regular waist, wide smocking at the top and tiers to the hem. Partly lined in viscose.
